lysdenart_screenlogjs.name: Console Screenlog
lysdenart_screenlogjs.description: Bring console.log, on the screen. (It's a port from https://github.com/chinchang/screenlog.js)

is-large-number.description: Test if a number is greater than 100.

number.name: Number
number.desc: Number to test if greater than 100.

settings.name: Settings
settings.desc: Settings as JSON: options - A map of additional options, logColor - Text color. Default is lightgreen., fontSize - Font size of logs. Default is 1em(Your browser's default). , bgColor - Background color of the log panel. Default is black. , releaseConsole - By default console.log is overridden to log on screen. You can avoid this behaviour by setting releaseConsole to true and instead use screenLog.log() API. Default is false.
